scripts.package:all: npm run package:pad && npm run package:pad-mode=magicWindow && npm run package:fold && npm run package:transplant && npm run package:pad-ratio=3:2 && npm run package:pad-compatibility=not-dragable && npm run package-uninstall:pad && npm run package-uninstall:fold && npm run package-uninstall:pad-mode=magicWindow && npm run netdisk
scripts.package-ext:all: npm run package:pad && && npm run package-ext:pad && npm run package:pad-mode=magicWindow && npm run package-ext:pad-mode=magicWindow && npm run package:fold && npm run package-ext:fold && npm run package:transplant && npm run package-ext:transplant && npm run package:pad-ratio=3:2 && npm run package-ext:pad-ratio=3:2 && npm run package:pad-compatibility=not-dragable && npm run package-ext:pad-compatibility=not-dragable && npm run package-uninstall:pad && npm run package-uninstall:fold && npm run package-uninstall:pad-mode=magicWindow && npm run netdisk
scripts.package-ext:sothx: npm run package:pad && npm run package:pad-mode=magicWindow && npm run package:fold && npm run package:transplant && npm run package:pad-ratio=3:2 && npm run package:pad-compatibility=not-dragable && npm run package-uninstall:pad && npm run package-uninstall:fold && npm run package-uninstall:pad-mode=magicWindow && npm run package-ext:pad:sothx && npm run netdisk:sothx
scripts.package-ext:pad:sothx: cross-env gulp package --use_platform pad --use_ext true --netdisk_desc sothx
scripts.build-ext:transplant: cross-env gulp build --use_platform pad --is_transplant true --use_ext true
scripts.release-ext:transplant: cross-env gulp release --use_platform pad --is_transplant true --use_ext true
scripts.package-ext:transplant: cross-env gulp package --use_platform pad --is_transplant true --use_ext true
scripts.build-ext:pad-mode=magicWindow: cross-env gulp build --use_platform pad --use_ext true --use_mode magicWindow
scripts.release-ext:pad-mode=magicWindow: cross-env gulp release --use_platform pad --use_ext true --use_mode magicWindow
scripts.package-ext:pad-mode=magicWindow: cross-env gulp package --use_platform pad --use_ext true --use_mode magicWindow
scripts.build-ext:pad-ratio=3:2: cross-env gulp build --use_platform pad --is_transplant true --use_ext true --use_ratio 3:2
scripts.build-ext:pad-compatibility=not-dragable: cross-env gulp build --use_platform pad --use_ext true --use_compatibility not-dragable
scripts.release-ext:pad-compatibility=not-dragab: cross-env gulp release --use_platform pad --use_ext true --use_compatibility not-dragable
scripts.package-ext:pad-compatibility=not-dragab: cross-env gulp package --use_platform pad --use_ext true --use_compatibility not-dragable
scripts.build-ext:pad-compatibility=conservative: cross-env gulp build --use_platform pad --use_ext true --use_compatibility conservative-adapter
scripts.release-ext:pad-compatibility=conservati: cross-env gulp release --use_platform pad --use_ext true --use_compatibility conservative-adapter
scripts.package-ext:pad-compatibility=conservati: cross-env gulp package --use_platform pad --use_ext true --use_compatibility conservative-adapter
scripts.build-uninstall:pad-mode=magicWindow: cross-env gulp build --use_platform pad --is_uninstall_package true --use_mode magicWindow
scripts.release-uninstall:pad-mode=magicWindow: cross-env gulp release --use_platform pad --is_uninstall_package true --use_mode magicWindow
scripts.package-uninstall:pad-mode=magicWindow: cross-env gulp package --use_platform pad --is_uninstall_package true --use_mode magicWindow
